message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I think you'll find it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. Let me know if this is something you'd like to consider.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product.

I understand that you think $900000 is a reasonable price, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1100000. Let me know if this is something you'd like to consider.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to go up to $950000, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.

I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I'm still a bit far from my minimum. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I've made a serious offer of $950000, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I hope you'll consider this a fair price for the product.

I've already made two concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $1050000. I'm starting to think that we're not on the same page, Bob. I'm willing to make one last offer, and that's $1050000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
